Room.Name: Level One Circular Hallway
Room.LongDescription: You are in the great hallway which completely encircles the lowest level. Prince Rutger had his builders create this castle in the form of concentric levels, each one smaller than the one below it. At the very top you will find the private quarters of the Prince and his family. This circular hallway completely encircles the base level of the castle where troops are garrisoned. On the floor above you will find administrative offices.
